name: Transgender Legal Help Desk
description: TLC's Legal Information HelpDesk provides basic information about laws and policies affecting transgender people across many issue areas, including the following: - Employment - Health care - Housing - Civil rights - Immigration - Prisoners’ rights - Identity document changes NOTE: TLC does not provide any individualized legal advice or legal representation, or take on cases through their Legal Information Helpdesk. How to Apply: - Submit requests using TLC's online form. Service Contact Informa
